isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - REMOVE - INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove front cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

Remove front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

Remove front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY . For removing front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

With the front cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 72)
removed and placed on a suitable work surface. Remove front cab door outer cab door handle and front cab door latch as follows.

Remove front cab door outer cab door handle, refer to OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE . For removing front cab door outer cab door handle, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.
Remove front cab door latch, refer to CAB DOOR LATCH . For removing front cab door latch, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Latch on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 90 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) laying on it's front, remove inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) with the spring (Item 3) from retaining clip (Item 4), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 90. Inner Cab Door Handle and Control Rods

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD
5. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 81
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: With the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) laying on it's back, remove hex bolt (Item 1) from inner cab door handle (Item 2), driver side shown.

Slide inner cab door handle (Item 2) to the right enough to pull both retaining tabs (Item 3) out of the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4). Lift inner cab door handle up and over the window regulator assembly and slide it to the right until the inner cab door handle control rods (Items 2 and 5, Figure 90)
clear the opening in the front cab door modular door hardware assembly, driver side shown. Lay inner cab door handle with inner cab door handle control rods out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 91 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Once inner cab door handle (Item 1) is removed from front cab door modular door hardware assembly, remove inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) from inner cab door handle, then remove inner cab door handle control rod (Item 3) with the spring (Item 4) from slotted hole of inner cab door handle, driver side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 91. Inner Cab Door Handle and Control Rods

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD
3. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side front cab door inner cab door handle.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Cab Door Inner Cab Door Handle on Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove rear cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

Remove rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for all Models.

Remove rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY . For removing rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Crew Cab for all Models.

With the rear cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 74)
removed and placed on a suitable work surface. Remove rear cab door outer cab door handle and rear cab door latch as follows.

Remove rear cab door outer cab door handle, refer to OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE . For removing rear cab door outer cab door handle, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Crew Cab for all Models.
Remove rear cab door latch, refer to CAB DOOR LATCH . For removing rear cab door latch, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Latch on Crew Cab for all Models.

step1.para: With the modular door hardware assembly (Item 1) laying on it's front, remove inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) with the spring (Item 3) from retaining clip (Item 4), driver side shown.

for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: With the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4) laying on it's back, remove hex bolt (Item 1) from inner cab door handle (Item 2), driver side shown.

Slide inner cab door handle (Item 2) to the right enough to pull both retaining tabs (Item 3) out of the modular door hardware assembly (Item 4). Lift inner cab door handle up and over the window regulator assembly and slide it to the right until the inner cab door handle control rods (Items 2 and 5, Figure 90)
clear the opening in the modular door hardware assembly, driver side shown. Lay inner cab door handle with inner cab door handle control rods out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

step1.para: Once inner cab door handle (Item 1) is removed from modular door hardware assembly, remove inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) from inner cab door handle, then remove inner cab door handle control rod (Item 3) with the spring (Item 4) from slotted hole of inner cab door handle, driver side shown. Lay them out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
